testcase.name: To validate create product by using valid data
testcase.system-out: Given I create product by using create new product API......................passed When I provide valid data for product creation..............................passed And I store id of the product...............................................passed Then I validate status code 201.............................................passed

testcase.name: To validate get details of product as per id provided
testcase.system-out: Given I have the id of the product whose details are to be fetched..........passed When I get the product details as per given id..............................passed Then I get details of product along with status code as 200.................passed

testcase.name: To validate delete product functionality as per given id
testcase.system-out: Given I have the id of the product to be deleted............................passed When I post delete request to delete request API endpoint...................passed Then I validate response code as 200........................................passed

testcase.name: To validate get order feature with valid data for 10 products
testcase.system-out: Given I want to get details of 10 products..................................passed When I get the products details of 10 products using Get all product API endpoint.passed Then I validate status code as 200..........................................passed And I validate product count as 51958.......................................passed
